mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishlist (mem_code, guest_code, product_code, create_at, update_at) VALUES (#{memCode}, #{guestCode}, #{productCode}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select:
SELECT w.wishlist_code, w.mem_code, w.guest_code, w.product_code, w.create_at, w.update_at,
p.product_name, p.product_active, p.product_id, p.product_quantity,
pr.price_selling AS sellingPrice, pr.price_original AS originalPrice,
-- 대표 이미지 (SELECT i.image_url FROM image i WHERE i.product_code = p.product_code AND i.image_type = 'title' ORDER BY i.image_order LIMIT 1 ) AS productImage,
-- 평균 평점 (공개 리뷰만) (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(r.rating),2), 0) FROM review r JOIN order_items oi ON r.order_item_code = oi.order_item_code WHERE oi.product_code = p.product_code AND r.is_active = 1 ) AS reviewAvg,
-- 리뷰 수량 (공개 리뷰만) (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review r JOIN order_items oi ON r.order_item_code = oi.order_item_code WHERE oi.product_code = p.product_code AND r.is_active = 1 ) AS reviewCount,
-- 위시리스트에 담긴 횟수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wishlist w2 WHERE w2.product_code = p.product_code ) AS wishlistCount
FROM wishlist w INNER JOIN product p ON w.product_code = p.product_code INNER JOIN price pr ON p.product_code = pr.product_code WHERE w.mem_code = #{memCode} AND w.guest_code IS NULL ORDER BY w.create_at DESC
